author: Moop Bread

text:
@ electricmastro

  The Super Smash Bros. Melee  statue (does that count as official canon?) states
that Bowser has actually been capturing Peach over and over in an attempt to lure
Mario into his traps.

  If that's true, maybe in this case he decided to just forgo
all of that and come directly for the Mario bros. Little did he
know of the awesome power of Peach's mood swings and
the terrifying capabilities of the almighty umbrella.

text: I HAVE this game! I just never played it. I have like a 8 year spanning 10 game backlog. And my ex added to the list when she loaned me this game. However we broke up before I finished. I remember her scouring eBay and Gamestop for this game, so I know it's kind of rare.  I THOUGHT I returned it, but I found it in my glove compartment. Now I can't return it because she died like a year after we broke up. =o/  And this was posted on her birthday =oO wow.
